import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'../styles/Home.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{// Unsplash image (free to use) as live-photo background; replace with local asset if desired

I keep coming back.",author:'— Alex M.'},{text:"A delightful shopping experience from start to finish.",author:'— Taylor W.'}];const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);const[paused,setPaused]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(paused)return undefined;const t=setInterval(()=>{setIndex(i=>(i+1)%quotes.length);},4000);return()=>clearInterval(t);},[quotes.length,paused]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"home-hero",style:{backgroundImage:"url(".concat(bgUrl,")")},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"overlay",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-content container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"hero-title",children:"Discover something you love"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"hero-sub",children:"Curated products, fast shipping, and deals you'll want to keep."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-cta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",className:"btn btn-primary btn-lg",children:"Shop Now"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/products",className:"btn btn-outline btn-lg",children:"Browse Collections"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quotes-carousel",onMouseEnter:()=>setPaused(true),onMouseLeave:()=>setPaused(false),"aria-live":"polite",children:[quotes.map((q,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quote ".concat(i===index?'active':''),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"quote-text",children:["\"",q.text,"\""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"quote-author",children:q.author})]},i)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quote-dots","aria-hidden":true,children:quotes.map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"dot ".concat(i===index?'dot-active':''),onClick:()=>setIndex(i),"aria-label":"Show quote ".concat(i+1)},i))})]})]})})});};export default Home;
